name: The Dniwer Experiment
description:
You are a part of an experiment startet by a scientist on your planet, to try to figure out if there is a hidden meaning behind the inhabitants of the planet earths so called "Weapons". Fight of all the enemies in each level to proceed to the next weapon.

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move. Space to shoot/interact. Escape to pause and/or quit. You may be able to play the game with controller (standard unity support), but i havent tested that.

Font: Kenney Pixel Font

Music: Laser and Phaser by Evan King  (weekly loops season 2)

Sfx: Made in bfxr or from freesound.org

Challenge: Made in just over 4 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme REWIND. 

Theme interpretation: I did not want to go with the obvious and wanted to try alot of different things in the same game. That ended up making this somewhat wierd game where you get rewinded back through the history of weapons on earth, as a part of an experiment to find the meaning of violence on earth.
